meaningMnemonic: You have an <radical>animal</radical> and you <radical>say</radical> it’s a <radical>dog</radical> to prevent it from going to <kanji>prison</kanji>. Dogs are the only animals that don’t have to go to prison. Your animal is not a dog, but you say it is to prevent it from going to prison.
readingMnemonic: What is the name of your animal? Your animal is named <reading>Goku</reading> (ごく). Yeah, like Goku from Dragon Ball Z. You don’t want your little Goku to go to <kanji>prison</kanji>, so you say that he’s a dog.
